message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for us to work together. I'm willing to offer you the product for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $105.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to make a slight concession and offer the product for $108.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $105 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product for $109.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in negotiating. I would like to counter with an offer of $107 for the product.
I'm almost at my limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $110.
Thank you for your offers, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to finalize our negotiation with an offer of $108 for the product.
